mapper.select:
select cube_id, cube_name, cube_desc, b.name "dsetName", b.dset_Id "dset", b.ds_id "dsId" from olap_cube_meta a, etl_dataset b where a.dset = b.dset_id
and cube_name like '%${keyword}%'
select case WHEN max(cube_id) is null then 1 else max(cube_id) + 1 end "id" from olap_cube_meta
mapper.insert: insert into olap_cube_meta(cube_id, cube_name, cube_desc, dset) values(#{cubeId}, #{cubeName}, #{desc}, #{dsetId})
mapper.update: update olap_cube_meta set cube_name=#{cubeName}, cube_desc=#{desc} where cube_id = #{cubeId}
mapper.select: select a.rid "id", a.cube_id "cubeId", a.col_type "col_type", a.col_id "col_id", a.col_name "col_name", a.tname "tname", b.dim_desc "text", c.dset "dsetId", c.cube_desc "cubeDesc", alias "alias", dim_type "dim_type", a.calc "iscalc", b.col_table_name "tableName", b.col_key "tableColKey", b.col_name "tableColName", a.ord "ord", dim_ord "dimord", b.group_type "grouptype", d.group_name "groupname", b.key_val_type "valType", b.ordcol "ordcol", b.dateformat "dateformat" from olap_cube_col_meta a join olap_dim_list b on a.col_id = b.dim_id join olap_cube_meta c on a.cube_id = c.cube_id left join olap_dim_group d on b.group_type = d.group_id where a.cube_id = #{cubeId} and a.col_type = 1 order by a.ord

select a.col_type "col_type", a.col_id "colid", a.col_name "colname", a.tname "tname",a.alias "alias", a.ord "ord", b.kpi_name "kpiname", b.unit "unit",b.aggre "aggre", b.calc_kpi "calcKpi", a.calc "calc", b.fmt "fmt", b.rate "rate", b.kpi_desc_key "kpi_desc_key" , a.col_id "id", b.kpi_name "text" from olap_cube_col_meta a join olap_kpi_list b on a.col_id = b.rid where col_type = 2 and a.cube_id = #{cubeId} order by a.ord

select a.rid as "id", a.cube_id as "cubeId", c.dset as "dsetId", f.ds_id as "dsid", a.tname "tname", a.col_type as "col_type", a.col_id as "col_id", a.col_name as "col_name", b.dim_desc as "dim_name", b.dim_desc "text", 'open' as "state", 'icon-dim' as "iconCls", alias "alias", '' as "fmt", '' as "aggre", dim_type as "dim_type", cas_parent as "iscas", b.col_table_name as "tableName", b.col_key as "tableColKey", b.col_name as "tableColName", a.ord as "ord", b.ordcol as "ordcol", 1 as "ord2", dim_ord "dimord", 1 as "rate", '' as "unit", b.group_type as "grouptype", d.group_name as "groupname", 0 as "calc_kpi", a.calc as "calc", b.key_val_type "valType", b.dateformat as "dateformat" from olap_cube_col_meta a join olap_dim_list b on a.col_id = b.dim_id join olap_cube_meta c on a.cube_id = c.cube_id join etl_dataset f on f.dset_id = c.dset left join olap_dim_group d on b.group_type = d.group_id where a.cube_Id = #{cubeId} and a.col_type = 1 UNION all select a.rid id, a.cube_id, d.dset, f.ds_id as "dsid", a.tname,a.col_type, a.col_id, a.col_name, '' as dim_name, c.kpi_name text, 'open' as state, 'icon-kpi' as iconCls, alias, fmt, aggre, '' as dim_type, '' as iscas, '' as tableName, '' as tableColKey, '' as tableColName, ord, '' as ordcol, 2 as ord2, '' as dimord, rate, unit, '' as grouptype, '' as groupname, calc_kpi, a.calc,'' as valType, '' as dateformat from olap_cube_col_meta a, olap_kpi_list c, olap_cube_meta d, etl_dataset f where a.cube_id = #{cubeId} and a.col_id = c.rid and a.col_type = 2 and a.cube_id = d.cube_id and d.dset = f.dset_id order by "ord2", "ord"
select a.cube_id "cubeId", 'noname' as "tname", a.cube_name "text", 'open' as "state", 'icon-cube' as "iconCls" from olap_cube_meta a where cube_id in (${selectDsIds}) order by cube_id
